title: Pig Pig Meets the Lion
description: There's nothing quite like a boy and his . . . lion?Pig Pig wakes up one morning to a BIG surprise. While Mama makes breakfast, Pig Pig and the lion run down the stairs, through the kitchen, over the furniture, and romp around the house. Prepositions and positional language abound in this playful story, and an unexpected friendship is forged. But will the lion be able to stay, or will the two new friends be separated forever?Â An action-packed laugh-out-loud read-aloud for youngsters fond of boisterous and imaginative play.
author: David McPhail
